descriptionHtml:
Osare HotPants - CHSBHC

[url=http://postimg.org/image/q85cnti8h/][img]http://s24.postimg.org/q85cnti8h/enb2013_10_28_1_18_21.jpg[/img][/url]

Recommended:
========================
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics 
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB 
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation

Installation:
Unpack the contents to your Skyrim data folder.

Require:
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) (Optional)

Obtain:
Please you use the [Osare HotPants] ring to get when you game start.
Or, please see the merchant in Qasmoke.

Armor Ratings:
This armors can be improved ArmorRating by money.
But because of the high amount of money, please grade down if necessary free of charge.

Special Thanks:
Osare HotPants - UNP by anano
CHSBHC body mod and BBP by CherryHotaling
author: golgappa
